#summary A brief introduction to tc-ext-tools.

= Introduction =

tc-ext-tools is an extension build system developed to run under Tiny Core Linux. The main aim aim of the project is to provide a high-level, easy extension maintenance system for TCL package (tcz) maintainers. One of the best designs of tc-ext-tools is to host package build files in an svn repository thus all the information to build a package is publicly available to everyone.

= Installation =

Download and extract the tarball or check out from svn repository and follow instructions in INSTALL file.

{{{
svn checkout http://tc-ext-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
}}}

= Usage =

* Adding a new package
{{{
mkdir package
cd package
boostit package version "extension1 extension2 ..."
}}}

_Note: version can be a number, "svn" or "git"._


* See available packages for more
{{{
svn checkout http://tc-ext-tools.googlecode.com/svn/tc-packages/
}}}
